item.title: Sword of blankness
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch2 Java Is My Bitch
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch2 wrote:

[quote=“rip4d, post:14, topic:329608”][quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=425987.msg3132340#msg3132340 date=1266613006]

[quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=425987.msg3131364#msg3131364 date=1266533279]

[quote author=Java Is My Bitch link=topic=425987.msg3131360#msg3131360 date=1266533100]

[quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=425987.msg3130047#msg3130047 date=1266390959]
Dont tell him to use a cylinder. As an inexperienced modeller it would be better for him to shape a cube into a cylinder. People should learn to self-smooth not use tools.
[/quote]People should learn both.
[/quote]tbh to my opinion and don’t start flaming, primtives are really bad for modeling, I always model freehand, but i do use priitives when I need to attach a tube or a ball to my freehanded models
[/quote]There’s certain advantages to all the techniques, but prims are actually very good for modeling. I know how to do both and I use them both. Primitives always make the neater model though.
[/quote]I’ve forgotten how to freehand, tbh.
By that, I mean whenever I try to freehand now it looks crappy.[/quote]People have their specialties, freehanding might look great for one person and horrible for an other.

Read full topic

Dont tell him to use a cylinder. As an inexperienced modeller it would be better for him to shape a cube into a cylinder. People should learn to self-smooth not use tools.

[/quote]tbh to my opinion and don’t start flaming, primtives are really bad for modeling, I always model freehand, but i do use priitives when I need to attach a tube or a ball to my freehanded models
[/quote]There’s certain advantages to all the techniques, but prims are actually very good for modeling. I know how to do both and I use them both. Primitives always make the neater model though.[/quote]I’ve forgotten how to freehand, tbh.
By that, I mean whenever I try to freehand now it looks crappy.

Dont tell him to use a cylinder. As an inexperienced modeller it would be better for him to shape a cube into a cylinder. People should learn to self-smooth not use tools.
[/quote]People should learn both.
[/quote]tbh to my opinion and don’t start flaming, primtives are really bad for modeling, I always model freehand, but i do use priitives when I need to attach a tube or a ball to my freehanded models[/quote]There’s certain advantages to all the techniques, but prims are actually very good for modeling. I know how to do both and I use them both. Primitives always make the neater model though.

item.title: Sword of blankness
item.dc:creator: @Tribbinator Tribbinator
item.description:
@Tribbinator wrote:

This is how I did it with primitives and no sub-surfing…

But best sword ive seen from you yet…But PLEASE use a cylinder primitive for your handle, it bothers me when a handle isnt cylindrical.
